correct_order: Some cafes can get away with being plain vanilla.
The bigger your cafe, the more is the need for additional mean of income.
This is because the returns from browsing cover only a percentage of your costs.
Thrills, ranging from video games to burgers cover the rest.
These fruits will make your clients spend more time with you and also add to your profits.

sources: This is because the returns from browsing cover only a percentage of your costs.
Thrills, ranging from video games to burgers cover the rest.
The bigger your cafe, the more is the need for additional mean of income.
Some cafes can get away with being plain vanilla.
These fruits will make your clients spend more time with you and also add to your profits.
